attributes.action: follow the advice of the ACMD regarding the classification of cannabis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs is an independant body composed of experts in the field of drug abuse and harm reduction including doctors, researchers and senior police officers. They have recommended in a recent report that cannabis be kept as a Class C drug, however, the Home Secretary and the Prime Minister have announced plans to have it reclassified as Class B. We call upon the government to follow the advice of these independant experts rather than making this a political issue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
